dataBlock.description: The boy is indeed #Joss^. He has grown much in the past few years.
#Joss^ throws himself upon the newly slain wolf.
#Joss^ is following you closely and supporting his #mother^.
dataBlock.detailedDescription: His sour attitude seems diminished. The terror of the #nekker^ and the support of the #wolf^ may have caused a change in him.
He is filled with despair and spite.
He holds up his #mother^'s weight, her arm pulled over his shoulders.
dataBlock.dialogue:
Can it be you? First this grey #wolf^ and now the White Wolf come to my aid! I am Joss, and I beg you to forgive me for my misleading words I spoke to you at our last meeting. I have been shaken to my core, and have grown because of it.
Geralt: Good. So you can give me the truth, and all the truth. Are you alone down here?
Joss: I have this #wolf^ with me. I followed him and his mate to the clearing in the woods. I thought they would kill me when they finally spotted me, but then that monster appeared from the hut and chased us down here. A can't tell you how many days ago that was.
Geralt: What can you tell me?
Joss: That the wolves hated the monster more than they hated me. And that this is a witch's hut! That monster obeys her and watches us. She killed the second wolf tonight to open the #gate^. She threw some poor woman in there. I covered my face when the witch came, but I think the woman my have come from my own village.
Geralt: A sacrifice to open the #gate^, huh?
Joss: I suppose, but you mustn't hurt this #wolf^. He has saved my life.

How could you? You are a monster yourself.
Geralt: The gate needed a sacrifice. The nekker didn't cut it. It was either the wolf or you."
Joss: Whoever's through that gate can't be worth the life of this wolf.
My #mother^ is weak. We must get her home so she can rest.

dataBlock.description: #Joss^ seeing the woman cries out at once, "#Mother^!"
#Joss^ catches his #mother^ as she begins to slump down when the bonds release her.
dataBlock.detailedDescription: He pulls fruitlessly at the iron #bonds^.
He holds up his #mother^'s weight, her arm pulled over his shoulders.
dataBlock.dialogue: It's my #mother^! We need to unlock her #bonds^.
My #mother^ is weak. We must get her home so she can rest.
